titleInfo.title: Carolina Country Style: Hosted by Doug Mayes: Tape 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame© and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Recording is of a vairety of interviews performed by Doug Mayes (host/personaility) for WBT's Carolina Country Style radio program. The tape features interviews of Grandpa Jones (entertainer), Jimmy Martin (entertainer), Mrs. Guthrie (personality), Vaughan Horton (entertainer), Dave Dudley (entertainer), Loretta Lynn (entertainer), Dottie West (entertainer), Minnie Pearl (entertainer), Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs (musical group), Del Reeves (entertainer), and Billy Walker (entertainer). Recordings are from a variety of unknown dates. The tape is the second of six tapes.

subject.topic: Flatt and Scruggs and the Foggy Mountain Boys (Musical group)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
